tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE personalized_quizzes (
    quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quiz_name VARCHAR(255),
    quiz_topic VARCHAR(255),
    learning_goal VARCHAR(255),
    number_of_questions INT
)

CREATE TABLE quizzes (
    quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quiz_name VARCHAR(255),
    quiz_topic VARCHAR(255),
    quiz_difficulty VARCHAR(50),
    quiz_questions JSON
);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR, email VARCHAR, learning_goal VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE quizzes (quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY, quiz_name VARCHAR, topic VARCHAR, difficulty VARCHAR, creator_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (creator_id) REFERENCES users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE quiz_attempts (attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, quiz_id INT, score INT, attempt_date TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (quiz_id) REFERENCES quizzes(quiz_id));
